item.title: [TUT]How to make shops backround invisible (With Pic) [/TUT]
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

This tutorial is VERY simple!!!
Difficulty: 3/10
Requirments: A client, Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java/class, and also how to add comand (If not ill teach you)
How to make the shops backround invisible
Okay, in your client go to the file:Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java Once you open that up search:

chat

If that doesn’t work try:

back

Once you do this you should see something like:

else if (s.startsWith("mapback"))
	{
		try
		{
				Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("iceman_file_store_32/Sprites/MAPBACK 0.jag");
				anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
				PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
				pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

			}
			catch (Exception exception)
			{
				System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
			}
		}

NOT EXACTLY BUT SIMILAR Once you do that you want to try and add a code, if you don’t know how to add this tell me and i’ll help you.
Heres the code:

else if (s.startsWith("tradebacking"))
			{
				try
				{
						Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("iceman_file_store_32/Sprites/tradebacking 0.png");
						anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
						PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
						pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
						

					}
					catch (Exception exception)
					{
						System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
					}
				}

Let me explain this code, what happens is the system looks for tradebacking o.png, but when it can’t find it will just leave it blank, causing it to look really cool. There is a chance your client will not load, if that is the case then you need to change the sprite loader here labled as:

("iceman_file_store_32/Sprites/tradebacking 0.png");

To your sprites folder, then make that to whatever you want your backround to be, blank or whatever.

CREDITS
Rich For The Code
Cocoa For The client ;D
Whoever else wants credits

show.jpg769×519

Read full topic
